DOC.brief_title: S8600-S9031-S9333-A , Study DNA Samples From Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify differentially methylated region ( DMRs ) associate overall survival ( OS ) acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) patient normal cytogenetics . - To develop evaluate independent validation set prognostic score OS base identify DMR . - To determine whether prognostic score group patient risk group base OS . OUTLINE : Archived blood bone marrow sample analyze DNA methylation alteration CHARM array-based genome assay . Each patient 's clinical data also collect .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : De novo acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) patient normal cytogenetics treat curative therapy survive least 28 day therapy start Samples take follow study : SWOG8600 , SWOG9031 , SWOG9333 , SWOG9500 , SWOGS9918 , SWOGS0106 , SWOGS0112 Blood marrow specimen use PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
